more_content:
Fans of Southern rock can expect a rip-roaring good time when 38 Special comes to the southernmost island this spring.

With over four decades of making music together, 38 Special will play April 10 at the Sunset Green Event Lawn (3820 N. Roosevelt Blvd.). Doors are at 5:30 pm with the show starting at 7. Tickets are available ($60-$85) online.

Most people associate the band with arena-rock pop smashes like, “Hold On Loosely,” “Rockin’ Into the Night,” and “If I’d Been the One,” to name a few. The open-air show at the Sunset Green is extra-special because it offers fans a more intimate setting to enjoy radio hit favorites they can sing along to.

The event is for all ages, so bring the whole family!  Guests are encouraged to bring chairs or blankets to lounge on the lawn and enjoy the show. No coolers or outside food and drink permitted.

Make sure to check out a special concert package deal we're offering at 24 North Hotel, located right next to the Sunset Green. The deal includes admission to the concert and a stay at our hotel. Read more.

The Sunset Green Event Lawn is a multipurpose outdoor space that has been a hub of activity since its recent opening. It’s hosted Grammy award-winning headliners like Rick Springfield and Michael McDonald with events ranging from a silent disco party to a MMA fight night.

At over 12,000 square feet, the outdoor venue is designed to host weddings, concerts, family reunions, movie nights and more, with a capacity of 1,200. Guests who rent the space have flexibility to make it their own with amenities, including tents, dance floors, portable air conditioning units and more.

Additionally, onsite amenities at 24 North Hotel make the Sunset Green Event Lawn perfect for hosting a large group or organizing a corporate event. You and your guests won't have to worry about accommodations and can instead enjoy all the perks of 24 North. An onsite Starbucks and the newly-opened Republica Bar & Lounge is located right off the lobby. Plus, the ease of our hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square makes choosing 24 North a no-brainer.

Planning a stay in Key West? Check out our best rates. We have an on-site Starbucks, shuttle service to Old Town every hour, and our pool area is one of the best on the island. See our special offers, which include special rates for Florida residents!
title: 38 Special Plays Key West!
